lead_paragraph: There is no possibility of parole for Dante Viggiano, 21, who killed a 66-year-old man and seriously injured his wife in 2014.

headline.print_headline: S.I. Man Gets Life for Fatal Stabbing in Home Invasion
headline.main: Man Gets Life Term for Fatal Stabbing During Staten Island Home Invasion

snippet: There is no possibility of parole for Dante Viggiano, 21, who killed a 66-year-old man and seriously injured his wife in 2014.
abstract: Dante Viggiano of Staten Island is sentenced to life in prison with no possibility of parole for 2014 murder of Peter and Vincenza Gialluisi in home invasion in South Shore neighborhood.
